text: haey trong ban bangruobabangruom aoy mean samokkipheap rveang duong chetd robsa puokke( anak mean chomnue) . brasenbae anak ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde now leu phendei nih teangoasa ka anak min ach bangruobabangruom rveang chetd robsa puokke ban der bo nde a l laoh ach bangruobabangruom rveang puokke( aoy mean chomnue) ban . pitabrakd nasa trong mha khlangpouke mha ktebandet
